pli-tv-bu-vb-pc91:0.2: The monks’ rules and their analysis
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc91:0.3: The chapter on offenses entailing confession
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc91:0.5: 91. The training rule on rainy-season robes
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc91:1.1: At one time the Buddha was staying at Sāvatthī in the Jeta Grove, Anāthapiṇḍika’s Monastery.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc91:1.2: At that time the Master had allowed the rainy-season robe for the monks.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc91:1.4: Knowing this, the monks from the group of six used over-sized rainy-season robes.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc91:1.5: As they were walking about, they were dragging them along, both in front and behind.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc91:1.6: The monks of few desires complained and criticized those monks,
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc91:1.7: “How can the monks from the group of six use over-sized rainy-season robes?” …
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc91:1.8: “Is it true, monks, that you do this?”
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc91:1.11: Foolish men, how can you use over-sized rainy-season robes?
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc91:1.12: This will not give rise to confidence in those without it …
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc91:1.13: And, monks, this training rule should be recited thus:
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc91:1.14: ‘If a monk is getting a rainy-season robe made, it should be made to the right size.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc91:1.15: This is the right size: 3.6 meters long and 1.5 meters wide.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc91:1.16: If it exceeds that, it is to be cut down, and he commits an offense entailing confession.’”
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc91:2.2: for use during the four months of the rainy season.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc91:2.4: making it himself or getting someone else to make it, it should be made to the right size.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc91:2.5: This is the right size: 3.6 meters long and 1.5 meters wide.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc91:2.6: If he makes one or gets one made that exceeds that, then the effort constitutes wrong conduct.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc91:2.7: When he obtains it, it is to be cut down, and he is then to confess an offense entailing confession.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc91:2.8: If he finishes what he began himself, he commits an offense entailing confession.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc91:2.9: If he gets others to finish what he began himself, he commits an offense entailing confession.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc91:2.10: If he finishes himself what was begun by others, he commits an offense entailing confession.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc91:2.11: If he gets others to finish what was begun by others, he commits an offense entailing confession.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc91:2.12: If he makes one or gets one made for the benefit of someone else, he commits an offense of wrong conduct.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc91:2.13: If he obtains one that was made by someone else and then uses it, he commits an offense of wrong conduct.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc91:2.15: if he makes it the right size;
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc91:2.16: if he makes it less than the right size;
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc91:2.17: if he obtains one made by another that exceeds the right size and he cuts it down before using it;
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc91:2.18: if he makes a canopy, a floor cover, a cloth screen, a mattress, or a pillow;
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc91:2.20: if he is the first offender.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc91:2.21: The ninth rule, the training rule on rainy-season robes, is finished.
